Title: Conversations with Dead People
Plot: Five seperate stories in this episode has the gang encountering a paranormal force which spells future doom.   While out on patrol, Buffy squares off with a former classmate and current vampire, who goads her into revealing her insecurities. Back at home, Dawn is thrown into a panic when an invisible force trashes the Summers' house and deposits the corpse of her mother on the sofa. The ghost of Cassie visits Willow under the guise of being sent by Tara; and Spike apparently has returned to his
GuestStars: Stacey Scowley, Azura Skye, Jonathan M. Woodward
